name: midnight-privacy-dapp
description: Privacy-preserving DApp on Midnight Network with ZK proofs

scripts.setup-circuits: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-keys: snarkjs groth16 setup build/circuits/entity_proof.r1cs pot12_final.ptau entity_proof_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute entity_proof_0000.zkey entity_proof_0001.zkey --name='1st Contributor Name' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey entity_proof_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.generate-age-keys: snarkjs groth16 setup build/circuits/age_verification.r1cs pot12_final.ptau age_verification_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute age_verification_0000.zkey age_verification_0001.zkey --name='Age Verification Contributor' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey age_verification_0001.zkey age_verification_key.json
